1288000.name: Fault - Masters Pack
1288000.description:
FOUNDERS PACK
The ultimate Fault experience. Owning the Masters Pack will enlist all 14 early access launch heroes to your roster and grant you 2,000 Coins (Fault's premium currency) to spend on cosmetics as well as the Season 0 Pass.

Season 0 Hero Pack
  • Dekker
  • Grim.EXE
  • Grux
  • Gadget
  • Riktor
  • Morigesh
  • Kallari

2,000 COINS
Grant $20's worth of Fault's premium currency. Purchase additional Heroes, unlock a fresh new skin for your favourite or any of the additional cosmetics available in the Fault store. PLEASE NOTE: These coins stack with the Founders Pack Coins (1,000), and instead grant you an additional 2,000 Coins for a total of 3,000.

14 HEROES
  • Boris
  • Countess
  • Gideon
  • Greystone
  • Khaimera
  • Kwang
  • Lt. Belica
  • Murdock
  • Muriel
  • Narbash
  • Sparrow
  • Steel
  • Twinblast
1288000.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
